item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @wicked_pker wicked pker
item.description:
@wicked_pker wrote:

k thanks so il have to add like 7 of them for all trees is there easier way[br][size=1]Posted on: June 27, 2007, 05:16:21 PM[/size][hr]case 1276: // tree if(playerLevel[8] >= 1) { // lol Tom else { if(!hasAxe()) { sendMessage("You need an axe to chop down this tree."); ResetWC(); } else if(hasAxe()) { startAnimation(875); sendMessage("you get a log of the tree , Wow !"); addSkillXP((30*playerLevel[8]), 8); addItem(1511, 1); actionTimer = 5; } else { sendMessage("you need 0 wc to cut this!"); }

would this work

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

I have this for axe.

public boolean WC() {

if(WCTimer <= 0) {
if(TreeHP == 0) {
AddGlobalObj(TreeX, TreeY, 1341, 0, 10);
sendMessage("This tree has ran out of logs");
ResetWC();
return false;
}
else {
if(!hasAxe()) {
sendMessage("You need an axe to chop down this tree.");
ResetWC();
}
else if(hasAxe()) {
addSkillXP(WCxp, 8);
if(!addItem(logID, logAmount)) {
ResetWC();
return false;
}
else {
sendMessage("You get some logs.");
WCTimer = TreeTimer;
TreeHP--;
return true;
}
}
}
}
return false;
}

Read full topic
